summary: A configurable 2‑D UNet architecture for conditional audio diffusion models. It accepts a noisy latent sample, timestep embeddings, and up to two conditioning embeddings, applying optional self‑attention and multiple cross‑attention layers across down‑, middle‑ and up‑sampling blocks to generate a denoised output.
business_intent: Provide a flexible neural network module that can be integrated into audio generation pipelines using diffusion techniques, offering customizable attention mechanisms and conditioning options to improve synthesis quality and adaptability.
